title: Implement Core Dashboard Layout System with Grid Framework
description: Create a responsive grid-based layout system for the dashboard that supports widget positioning, sizing, and rearrangement. The layout should use CSS Grid or a similar framework to handle responsive breakpoints and widget positioning. Acceptance criteria: Grid system supports variable widget sizes (small, medium, large), layout adapts to mobile/desktop breakpoints, widgets can be positioned at specific grid coordinates, layout maintains proper spacing and alignment, system supports future drag-and-drop integration, TypeScript interfaces defined for layout configuration.
